entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Saskatoon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:59 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Fog dissipating late this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:40 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 07:40 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023
